name: Castle Cat
description:
In this 2D platformer, you play as a knightly cat inside of the castle you call home. But alas, it appears that witches have infiltrated your home! It is your job to protect the castle and get rid of all the witches! 

At the time of upload, there is only one level made, no pause menu, and no way to exit the game once you have started it. 

The art used is not mine. Credit to 9E0  for the player and witch assets, and credit to Estúdio Vaca Roxa for the tile set I used.
